Precompiled Libraries



  • Expand All
  • Collapse All

Included page: .FlexOvl.ScheduleManagement.SetUp (edit)

import
com.alliander.osgp.acceptancetests

script
start scoped giv wen zen for slim schedulemanagement Test not run

Narrative

As OSGP I want clients to be able to set a tariff schedule for a selection of devices

Scenario: Set schedule

scenario set schedule input parameters device status oslpresponse weekday startday endday time index relayType ishigh tariffvalue ismessagesent result description
given a set tariff schedule request for device @device with weekday @weekday, startday @startday, endday @endday, time @time, index @index, relayType @relayType and ishigh @ishigh
and the set tariff schedule request refers device @device with status @status which always returns @oslpresponse
and the set tariff schedule request refers to an authorised organisation
when the set tariff schedule request is received
then the set tariff schedule request should return an async response with a correlationId and deviceId @device
and a set tariff schedule oslp message is sent to device @device should be @ismessagesent
and an ovl set tariff schedule result message with result @result and description @description should be sent to the ovl out queue

set schedule input parameters
device status oslpresponse weekday startday endday time index relayType ishigh ismessagesent result description
device-01 active OK MONDAY 08:00:00.000 1 TARIFF true true OK
scenario set schedule input parameters device status oslpresponse weekday startday endday time index relayType ishigh tariffvalue ismessagesent result description
given a set tariff schedule request for device device-01 with weekday MONDAY, startday , endday , time 08:00:00.000, index 1, relayType TARIFF and ishigh true
and the set tariff schedule request refers device device-01 with status active which always returns OK
and the set tariff schedule request refers to an authorised organisation
when the set tariff schedule request is received
then the set tariff schedule request should return an async response with a correlationId and deviceId device-01
and a set tariff schedule oslp message is sent to device device-01 should be true
and an ovl set tariff schedule result message with result OK and description should be sent to the ovl out queue
device-01 active OK WEEKDAY 21:00:00.000 1 TARIFF false true OK
scenario set schedule input parameters device status oslpresponse weekday startday endday time index relayType ishigh tariffvalue ismessagesent result description
given a set tariff schedule request for device device-01 with weekday WEEKDAY, startday , endday , time 21:00:00.000, index 1, relayType TARIFF and ishigh false
and the set tariff schedule request refers device device-01 with status active which always returns OK
and the set tariff schedule request refers to an authorised organisation
when the set tariff schedule request is received
then the set tariff schedule request should return an async response with a correlationId and deviceId device-01
and a set tariff schedule oslp message is sent to device device-01 should be true
and an ovl set tariff schedule result message with result OK and description should be sent to the ovl out queue
device-01 active OK MONDAY 18:00:00.000 1 TARIFF true true OK
scenario set schedule input parameters device status oslpresponse weekday startday endday time index relayType ishigh tariffvalue ismessagesent result description
given a set tariff schedule request for device device-01 with weekday MONDAY, startday , endday , time 18:00:00.000, index 1, relayType TARIFF and ishigh true
and the set tariff schedule request refers device device-01 with status active which always returns OK
and the set tariff schedule request refers to an authorised organisation
when the set tariff schedule request is received
then the set tariff schedule request should return an async response with a correlationId and deviceId device-01
and a set tariff schedule oslp message is sent to device device-01 should be true
and an ovl set tariff schedule result message with result OK and description should be sent to the ovl out queue
device-01 active OK MONDAY 18:00:00.000 1 TARIFF true true OK
scenario set schedule input parameters device status oslpresponse weekday startday endday time index relayType ishigh tariffvalue ismessagesent result description
given a set tariff schedule request for device device-01 with weekday MONDAY, startday , endday , time 18:00:00.000, index 1, relayType TARIFF and ishigh true
and the set tariff schedule request refers device device-01 with status active which always returns OK
and the set tariff schedule request refers to an authorised organisation
when the set tariff schedule request is received
then the set tariff schedule request should return an async response with a correlationId and deviceId device-01
and a set tariff schedule oslp message is sent to device device-01 should be true
and an ovl set tariff schedule result message with result OK and description should be sent to the ovl out queue
device-01 active OK ABSOLUTEDAY 20130301 18:00:00.000 1 TARIFF true true OK
scenario set schedule input parameters device status oslpresponse weekday startday endday time index relayType ishigh tariffvalue ismessagesent result description
given a set tariff schedule request for device device-01 with weekday ABSOLUTEDAY, startday 20130301, endday , time 18:00:00.000, index 1, relayType TARIFF and ishigh true
and the set tariff schedule request refers device device-01 with status active which always returns OK
and the set tariff schedule request refers to an authorised organisation
when the set tariff schedule request is received
then the set tariff schedule request should return an async response with a correlationId and deviceId device-01
and a set tariff schedule oslp message is sent to device device-01 should be true
and an ovl set tariff schedule result message with result OK and description should be sent to the ovl out queue
device-01 active FAILURE MONDAY 18:00:00.000 1 TARIFF true true NOT OK DEVICEMESSAGEFAILEDEXCEPTION
scenario set schedule input parameters device status oslpresponse weekday startday endday time index relayType ishigh tariffvalue ismessagesent result description
given a set tariff schedule request for device device-01 with weekday MONDAY, startday , endday , time 18:00:00.000, index 1, relayType TARIFF and ishigh true
and the set tariff schedule request refers device device-01 with status active which always returns FAILURE
and the set tariff schedule request refers to an authorised organisation
when the set tariff schedule request is received
then the set tariff schedule request should return an async response with a correlationId and deviceId device-01
and a set tariff schedule oslp message is sent to device device-01 should be true
and an ovl set tariff schedule result message with result NOT OK and description DEVICEMESSAGEFAILEDEXCEPTION should be sent to the ovl out queue
device-01 active REJECTED MONDAY 18:00:00.000 1 TARIFF true true NOT OK DEVICEMESSAGEREJECTEDEXCEPTION
scenario set schedule input parameters device status oslpresponse weekday startday endday time index relayType ishigh tariffvalue ismessagesent result description
given a set tariff schedule request for device device-01 with weekday MONDAY, startday , endday , time 18:00:00.000, index 1, relayType TARIFF and ishigh true
and the set tariff schedule request refers device device-01 with status active which always returns REJECTED
and the set tariff schedule request refers to an authorised organisation
when the set tariff schedule request is received
then the set tariff schedule request should return an async response with a correlationId and deviceId device-01
and a set tariff schedule oslp message is sent to device device-01 should be true
and an ovl set tariff schedule result message with result NOT OK and description DEVICEMESSAGEREJECTEDEXCEPTION should be sent to the ovl out queue
device-01 active OK MONDAY 08:00:00.000 1 TARIFF_REVERSED true true OK
scenario set schedule input parameters device status oslpresponse weekday startday endday time index relayType ishigh tariffvalue ismessagesent result description
given a set tariff schedule request for device device-01 with weekday MONDAY, startday , endday , time 08:00:00.000, index 1, relayType TARIFF_REVERSED and ishigh true
and the set tariff schedule request refers device device-01 with status active which always returns OK
and the set tariff schedule request refers to an authorised organisation
when the set tariff schedule request is received
then the set tariff schedule request should return an async response with a correlationId and deviceId device-01
and a set tariff schedule oslp message is sent to device device-01 should be true
and an ovl set tariff schedule result message with result OK and description should be sent to the ovl out queue
device-01 active OK WEEKDAY 21:00:00.000 1 TARIFF_REVERSED false true OK
scenario set schedule input parameters device status oslpresponse weekday startday endday time index relayType ishigh tariffvalue ismessagesent result description
given a set tariff schedule request for device device-01 with weekday WEEKDAY, startday , endday , time 21:00:00.000, index 1, relayType TARIFF_REVERSED and ishigh false
and the set tariff schedule request refers device device-01 with status active which always returns OK
and the set tariff schedule request refers to an authorised organisation
when the set tariff schedule request is received
then the set tariff schedule request should return an async response with a correlationId and deviceId device-01
and a set tariff schedule oslp message is sent to device device-01 should be true
and an ovl set tariff schedule result message with result OK and description should be sent to the ovl out queue
device-01 active OK MONDAY 18:00:00.000 1 TARIFF_REVERSED true true OK
scenario set schedule input parameters device status oslpresponse weekday startday endday time index relayType ishigh tariffvalue ismessagesent result description
given a set tariff schedule request for device device-01 with weekday MONDAY, startday , endday , time 18:00:00.000, index 1, relayType TARIFF_REVERSED and ishigh true
and the set tariff schedule request refers device device-01 with status active which always returns OK
and the set tariff schedule request refers to an authorised organisation
when the set tariff schedule request is received
then the set tariff schedule request should return an async response with a correlationId and deviceId device-01
and a set tariff schedule oslp message is sent to device device-01 should be true
and an ovl set tariff schedule result message with result OK and description should be sent to the ovl out queue
device-01 active OK MONDAY 18:00:00.000 1 TARIFF_REVERSED true true OK
scenario set schedule input parameters device status oslpresponse weekday startday endday time index relayType ishigh tariffvalue ismessagesent result description
given a set tariff schedule request for device device-01 with weekday MONDAY, startday , endday , time 18:00:00.000, index 1, relayType TARIFF_REVERSED and ishigh true
and the set tariff schedule request refers device device-01 with status active which always returns OK
and the set tariff schedule request refers to an authorised organisation
when the set tariff schedule request is received
then the set tariff schedule request should return an async response with a correlationId and deviceId device-01
and a set tariff schedule oslp message is sent to device device-01 should be true
and an ovl set tariff schedule result message with result OK and description should be sent to the ovl out queue
device-01 active OK ABSOLUTEDAY 20130301 18:00:00.000 1 TARIFF_REVERSED true true OK
scenario set schedule input parameters device status oslpresponse weekday startday endday time index relayType ishigh tariffvalue ismessagesent result description
given a set tariff schedule request for device device-01 with weekday ABSOLUTEDAY, startday 20130301, endday , time 18:00:00.000, index 1, relayType TARIFF_REVERSED and ishigh true
and the set tariff schedule request refers device device-01 with status active which always returns OK
and the set tariff schedule request refers to an authorised organisation
when the set tariff schedule request is received
then the set tariff schedule request should return an async response with a correlationId and deviceId device-01
and a set tariff schedule oslp message is sent to device device-01 should be true
and an ovl set tariff schedule result message with result OK and description should be sent to the ovl out queue
device-01 active FAILURE MONDAY 18:00:00.000 1 TARIFF_REVERSED true true NOT OK DEVICEMESSAGEFAILEDEXCEPTION
scenario set schedule input parameters device status oslpresponse weekday startday endday time index relayType ishigh tariffvalue ismessagesent result description
given a set tariff schedule request for device device-01 with weekday MONDAY, startday , endday , time 18:00:00.000, index 1, relayType TARIFF_REVERSED and ishigh true
and the set tariff schedule request refers device device-01 with status active which always returns FAILURE
and the set tariff schedule request refers to an authorised organisation
when the set tariff schedule request is received
then the set tariff schedule request should return an async response with a correlationId and deviceId device-01
and a set tariff schedule oslp message is sent to device device-01 should be true
and an ovl set tariff schedule result message with result NOT OK and description DEVICEMESSAGEFAILEDEXCEPTION should be sent to the ovl out queue
device-01 active REJECTED MONDAY 18:00:00.000 1 TARIFF_REVERSED true true NOT OK DEVICEMESSAGEREJECTEDEXCEPTION
scenario set schedule input parameters device status oslpresponse weekday startday endday time index relayType ishigh tariffvalue ismessagesent result description
given a set tariff schedule request for device device-01 with weekday MONDAY, startday , endday , time 18:00:00.000, index 1, relayType TARIFF_REVERSED and ishigh true
and the set tariff schedule request refers device device-01 with status active which always returns REJECTED
and the set tariff schedule request refers to an authorised organisation
when the set tariff schedule request is received
then the set tariff schedule request should return an async response with a correlationId and deviceId device-01
and a set tariff schedule oslp message is sent to device device-01 should be true
and an ovl set tariff schedule result message with result NOT OK and description DEVICEMESSAGEREJECTEDEXCEPTION should be sent to the ovl out queue

Parameters

  • device: device identification
  • status: device status (active, unknown, unregistered, ???)
  • oslpresponse: the state of the OSLP response (OK, FAILURE, REJECTED)
  • weekday: day for schedule (MONDAY, TUESDAY, WEDNESDAY, THURSDAY, FRIDAY, SATURDAY, SUNDAY, WEEKDAY, WEEKEND, ABSOLUTEDAY)
  • startday: start date for schedule in yyyymmdd format
  • endday: end date for schedule in yyyymmdd format
  • time: time for schedule in hhmmss UTC
  • index: the index of the tariff relay
  • relayType: the configuration for the tariff relay (LIGHT, TARIFF, TARIFF_REVERSED)
  • ishigh: high or low tariff
  • ismessagesent: is oslp message expected to be sent?
  • result: expected result returned by osgp (OK, NOT OK)
  • description: exception or error


Scenario: Set schedule with invalid schedule

scenario set schedule input parameters device status oslpresponse weekday startday endday time index relayType ishigh tariffvalue ismessagesent result description
given a set tariff schedule request for device @device with weekday @weekday, startday @startday, endday @endday, time @time, index @index, relayType @relayType and ishigh @ishigh
and the set tariff schedule request refers device @device with status @status which always returns @oslpresponse
and the set tariff schedule request refers to an authorised organisation
when the set tariff schedule request is received
then the set tariff schedule request should return a validation error
and a set tariff schedule oslp message is sent to device @device should be @ismessagesent

set schedule input parameters
device status oslpresponse weekday startday endday time index relayType ishigh ismessagesent result description
device-01 active OK ABSOLUTEDAY 18:00:00.000 1 TARIFF true false NOT OK VALIDATIONEXCEPTION
scenario set schedule input parameters device status oslpresponse weekday startday endday time index relayType ishigh tariffvalue ismessagesent result description
given a set tariff schedule request for device device-01 with weekday ABSOLUTEDAY, startday , endday , time 18:00:00.000, index 1, relayType TARIFF and ishigh true
and the set tariff schedule request refers device device-01 with status active which always returns OK
and the set tariff schedule request refers to an authorised organisation
when the set tariff schedule request is received
then the set tariff schedule request should return a validation error
and a set tariff schedule oslp message is sent to device device-01 should be false
device-01 active OK ABSOLUTEDAY 18:00:00.000 1 TARIFF_REVERSED true false NOT OK VALIDATIONEXCEPTION
scenario set schedule input parameters device status oslpresponse weekday startday endday time index relayType ishigh tariffvalue ismessagesent result description
given a set tariff schedule request for device device-01 with weekday ABSOLUTEDAY, startday , endday , time 18:00:00.000, index 1, relayType TARIFF_REVERSED and ishigh true
and the set tariff schedule request refers device device-01 with status active which always returns OK
and the set tariff schedule request refers to an authorised organisation
when the set tariff schedule request is received
then the set tariff schedule request should return a validation error
and a set tariff schedule oslp message is sent to device device-01 should be false

Parameters

  • device: device identification
  • status: device status (active, unknown, unregistered, ???)
  • oslpresponse: the state of the OSLP response (OK, FAILURE, REJECTED)
  • weekday: day for schedule (MONDAY, TUESDAY, WEDNESDAY, THURSDAY, FRIDAY, SATURDAY, SUNDAY, WEEKDAY, WEEKEND, ABSOLUTEDAY)
  • startday: start date for schedule in yyyymmdd format
  • endday: end date for schedule in yyyymmdd format
  • time: time for schedule in hhmmss UTC
  • index: the index of the tariff relay
  • relayType: the configuration for the tariff relay (LIGHT, TARIFF, TARIFF_REVERSED)
  • ishigh: high or low tariff
  • ismessagesent: is oslp message expected to be sent?
  • result: expected result returned by osgp (OK, NOT OK)
  • description: exception or error


Scenario: Receive A Get Set Tariff Schedule Response Request

scenario get set tariff schedule response input values correlationid deviceid isfound deviceid2 qresult qdescription result description
given a get set tariff schedule response request with correlationId @correlationid and deviceId @deviceid
and a set tariff schedule response message with correlationId @correlationid, deviceId @deviceid2, qresult @qresult and qdescription @qdescription is found in the queue @isfound
when the get set tariff schedule response request is received
then the get set tariff schedule response request should return a set schedule response with result @result and description @description

get set tariff schedule response input values
correlationid deviceid isfound deviceid2 qresult qdescription result description
cid-01 dvc-01 true dvc-01 OK OK
scenario get set tariff schedule response input values correlationid deviceid isfound deviceid2 qresult qdescription result description
given a get set tariff schedule response request with correlationId cid-01 and deviceId dvc-01
and a set tariff schedule response message with correlationId cid-01, deviceId dvc-01, qresult OK and qdescription is found in the queue true
when the get set tariff schedule response request is received
then the get set tariff schedule response request should return a set schedule response with result OK and description
cid-02 dvc-01 false NOT_FOUND
scenario get set tariff schedule response input values correlationid deviceid isfound deviceid2 qresult qdescription result description
given a get set tariff schedule response request with correlationId cid-02 and deviceId dvc-01
and a set tariff schedule response message with correlationId cid-02, deviceId , qresult and qdescription is found in the queue false
when the get set tariff schedule response request is received
then the get set tariff schedule response request should return a set schedule response with result NOT_FOUND and description
cid-03 dvc-01 true dvc-01 NOT_OK VALIDATION ERROR NOT_OK VALIDATION ERROR
scenario get set tariff schedule response input values correlationid deviceid isfound deviceid2 qresult qdescription result description
given a get set tariff schedule response request with correlationId cid-03 and deviceId dvc-01
and a set tariff schedule response message with correlationId cid-03, deviceId dvc-01, qresult NOT_OK and qdescription VALIDATION ERROR is found in the queue true
when the get set tariff schedule response request is received
then the get set tariff schedule response request should return a set schedule response with result NOT_OK and description VALIDATION ERROR

Parameters:

  • correlationId: correlation Id returned from a set light request
  • deviceid: the device identification
  • isfound: response found in the queue (true/false)
  • deviceid2: the other device identification
  • qresult: the result of the searching for the response in the queue (OK, NOT_FOUND, NOT_OK)
  • result: OK, NOT_OK or NOT_FOUND
  • description: exception or error

Contents:
  • Exploratory Tests (PBI685): Exploratory test for setting the tariff schedule of a device

  • Expand All
  • Collapse All

Included page: .FlexOvl.ScheduleManagement.TearDown (edit)

com.alliander.osgp.acceptancetests
